con:soapui-project.name: INSPIRE Download Service WFS 2_0_0 ISO19142 TG 3_1
con:soapui-project.con:description: This test project checks an implementation of a WFS 2.0.0 / ISO 19142 service to the requirements that the INSPIRE Download Service Technical Guidance (TG version 3.1) lays down. It tests for mandatory and optional parts, for so-called predefined and direct access services.

con:testSuite.name: TestSetup
con:testSuite.con:description: Request and parse the capabilities of the service and configure test cases. Requires the etf-sui-owsgtl test library.

con:property.con:name: M-01##HTTPGET__Description
con:property.con:value: The Capabilities advertize the HTTP GET conformance class by advertizing the KVPEncoding in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##INSPIRESchemaValid__Description
con:property.con:value: The Capabilities validate against the INSPIRE XML schema. This means that the Capabilities are valid WFS Capabilities and have the INSPIRE ExtendedCapabilities.

con:property.con:name: M-01##INSPIRESchema__Description
con:property.con:value: The xsi:schemaLocation of the Capabilities document shall include the INSPIRE schema at http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/schemas/inspire_dls/1.0/inspire_dls.xsd

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-AccessConstraints__Description
con:property.con:value: The WFS AccessConstraints element is provided in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ContactInfo__Description
con:property.con:value: The WFS ServiceProvider ContactInfo element is provided in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-DFT__Description
con:property.con:value: The response of a DescribeFeatureType request must be an XML Schema / XSD. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-Fees__Description
con:property.con:value: The WFS Fees element is provided in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ft-MetadataURL__Description
con:property.con:value: Every FeatureType has a MetadataURL, refering to a INSPIRE metadata document, describing the dataset

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-GetFeature__Description
con:property.con:value: Perform a GetFeature request and test if the result contains a wfs:FeatureCollection. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-GFI-4__Description
con:property.con:value: The gml:id of the Feature is the same for a GetFeatureById request if an gml:id from a GetFeature request is used

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-GFI-Listed__Name
con:property.con:value: ListStoredQueries advertizes GetFeatureById. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-GFI__Description
con:property.con:value: Test for support for GetFeatureById. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-GML32__Description
con:property.con:value: Support GML 3.2 as outputformat, check the Capabilities if this is advertized as 'application/gml+xml; version=3.2'. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-infoFeatureAccessService__Reference
con:property.con:value: INSPIRE Metadata Regulation and TG Requirement 53

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_fileIdentifier2__Description
con:property.con:value: The metadata document of the dataset, referenced from the service metadata, has a fileIdentifier

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_fileIdentifier2__Reference
con:property.con:value: INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_fileIdentifier__Description
con:property.con:value: The metadata document has a fileIdentifier

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_fileIdentifier__Reference
con:property.con:value: INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_identifierInServiceMD__Description
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier of the dataset metadata exists in the Service Metadata

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_identifierInServiceMD__Reference
con:property.con:value: INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_Identifier__Description
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier exists in the dataset metadata

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_Identifier__Name
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier exists in the dataset metadata

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_Metadata2__Description
con:property.con:value: The metadata of the dataset, referenced from the service metadata, has root element MD_Metadata

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_Metadata2__Reference
con:property.con:value: INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_Metadata__Description
con:property.con:value: The metadata document has root element MD_Metadata

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-MD_Metadata__Reference
con:property.con:value: ISO19139 encoding, INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ProviderName__Description
con:property.con:value: The WFS ServiceProvider ProviderName element is provided in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ResourceLocator__Description
con:property.con:value: The Capabilities provide the INSPIRE ResourceLocator in the ExtendedCapabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ResourceType__Description
con:property.con:value: The Capabilities provide the INSPIRE ResourceType in the ExtendedCapabilities

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-Schema__Description
con:property.con:value: Validate the Capabilities document against the declared schema. This schema is referenced in xsi:schemaLocation. [Disabled]

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD-validates__Description
con:property.con:value: The service metadata validates against the XML schema

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD-validates__Reference
con:property.con:value: ISO19139 encoding, INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_MD_Metadata__Description
con:property.con:value: The service metadata has a root element MD_Metadata

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_MD_Metadata__Reference
con:property.con:value: ISO19139 encoding, INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-SpatialDataServiceType__Description
con:property.con:value: The INSPIRE SpatialDataServiceType in the ExtendedCapabilities is set at 'download'

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-URI__Description
con:property.con:value: INSPIRE Unique Resource Identifier of the dataset is provided

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-Warning-01__Description
con:property.con:value: If the service does not offer featuretypes, other tests will fail or can't be executed. This test gives a warning if no featuretypes are provided by the WFS

con:property.con:name: M-01__Description
con:property.con:value: Test the WFS against requirements of a predefined WFS

con:property.con:name: O-02##GetPropValue__Description
con:property.con:value: Support GetPropertyValue. The GetPropertyValue request for this test is constructed with previous response to GetCapabilities and GetFeature requests.

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-ComparisonOperators__Description
con:property.con:value: Capabilities advertize all ComparisonOperators: PropertyIsEqualTo, PropertyIsNotEqualTo, PropertyIsLessThan, PropertyIsGreaterThan, PropertyIsLessThanOrEqualTo, PropertyIsGreaterThanOrEqualTo

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-GetFeatureFalseID__Description
con:property.con:value: A GetFeature response with a non-existing identifier does not contain any Features (no wfs:member returned). For conformance to Resource Identification and AdHoc Query conformance classes

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-GetFeatureFalseID__Name
con:property.con:value: GetFeature response with non-existing identifier is empty

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-MinTemporalFilter__Description
con:property.con:value: Capabilities advertizes ImplementsMinTemporalFilter, this is required for the support of the Minimum Temporal Filter Conformance Class

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-PropertyIsEqualTo__Description
con:property.con:value: PropertyIsEqualTo works correctly: response contains only Features of which the first textual property contains the requested value of PropertyIsEqualTo. A GetpropertyValue request is used to construct the PropertyIsEqualTo filter for this test.

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-SpatialOperatorBBOX__Description
con:property.con:value: SpatialOperator BBOX is declared in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: O-02##XPathAdvertized__Description
con:property.con:value: The Capabilities advertize support for XPath

con:property.con:name: O-02##XPath__Description
con:property.con:value: Minimum Xpath is supported. A GetFeature request with an XPath in it, must return a valid response

con:property.con:name: O-02__Description
con:property.con:value: Test the WFS against requirements of a Direct Access WFS (optional)

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-StoredQueryINSPIRE__Description
con:property.con:value: Pre-defined Stored Queries shall be provided to make pre-defined datasets available. Pre-defined Stored Queries shall use the parameter names 'CRS', 'DataSetIdCode', 'DataSetIdNamespace' and 'Language' to identify the CRS, dataset ID code, dataset ID namespace and language components of a query.

con:property.con:name: O-02##O-02-GetPropertyValue__Description
con:property.con:value: Support GetPropertyValue. The GetPropertyValue request for this test is constructed with previous response to GetCapabilities and GetFeature requests. For this test it is used to construct a Filter and test the

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_coupledResource__Description
con:property.con:value: Because the metadata describes the service, there must be a coupled resource.

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_coupledResource__Reference
con:property.con:value: TG Metadata, 2.2.6, req 7; Implementing Rule Metadata Part B. 1.6

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_coupledResourceHref__Name
con:property.con:value: srv:operatesOn contains a reference to a metadata document

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_coupledResourceHref__Description
con:property.con:value: srv:operatesOn contains a reference to a metadata document, through the xlink:href attribute

con:property.con:name: M-01##M-01-ServiceMD_coupledResourceHref__Reference
con:property.con:value: TG Metadata, 2.2.6, req 7; Implementing Rule Metadata Part B. 1.6

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: The DescribeFeatureType response is an XML Schema.</result>
